rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: A welcoming open space that integrates Vastu principles with the traditional Kerala architectural aesthetics. The entrance is oriented north-east to harness positive energy.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace positioned in the east section for productivity and natural light. The space follows Vastu guidelines by being placed away from direct noise sources.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A private gym area integrated into the ground floor for convenience, with ventilation and proper lighting ensuring a healthy environment. Placed in the north-west to ensure stability.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Dining
rooms.description: The kitchen is designed as an open space adjacent to the dining area. The layout ensures that it is located in the east for positive energy flow while maintaining proximity to the entrance.

rooms.name: Multipurpose Hall / Lounge
rooms.description: A spacious hall serving as a lounge area and multipurpose space. The design incorporates traditional Kerala woodwork and open veranda style to embrace natural light.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A grand entrance with Kerala-style wood carving details to set the tone for traditional aesthetics.

openings.name: Balcony (Bedroom 1)
openings.description: Spacious balcony providing outdoor access and natural ventilation as per Vastu principles.

openings.name: Balcony (Bedroom 2)
openings.description: Another balcony offering a personal outdoor space ensuring privacy and fresh air.

openings.name: Balcony (Bedroom 3)
openings.description: Spacious balcony ensuring the bedroom receives natural light while adhering to traditional Kerala design.

openings.name: Balcony (Bedroom 4)
openings.description: A balcony designed for personal relaxation and connectivity with nature, in accordance with Vastu principles.
